scripts.build:ui: [[ -a Procfile ]] && rm -rf build && cd ../../fullstackopen/part2/phonebook && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../fullstackopen.deploy/fullstackopen-phonebook-backend/ && rm -rf build && cd ../../../fullstackopen.deploy/fullstackopen-phonebook-backend
scripts.deploy:full: [[ -a Procfile ]] && npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy
